hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] ESLint: $file_path" >> .claude/logs/hooks.log; pnpm eslint --fix "$file_path" 2>&1 >> .claude/logs/hooks.log; }

jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] Prettier: $file_path" >> .claude/logs/hooks.log; pnpm prettier --write "$file_path" 2>&1 >> .claude/logs/hooks.log; }
